title: Sample simulated data for Emax exposure-response models with covariates. — emax_df
text: simulated dataset entirely synthetic. generic data set can used illustrate Emax modeling. contains variables corresponding dose exposure, includes continuous response variable binary response variable. Three continuous valued covariates included, along two binary covariates. can find data generating code package source code, R/data.R
